page.title: 10Shopping in the Area.
page.content: In our study area we have {2} communities.The larger one is{Cwmavon and the smaller one is {Pontrhydyfen. In {Pontrhydyfen}we have a butchers shop,a Post Office which sells cigarettes,sweets,drinks,stationery and other things.We also have a shop which used to be an old CO-OP,but was bought by a man from {PAKISTAN},and now sells everything.The people in { {OAKWOOD} usually walk over the old aqueduct to the shops,but as it is closed at present because of cracks in the roadway and walls they have to take a longer route to the shops. In{ Cwmavon}there is a large co-op supermarket,and a row of shops opposite containing a chemist, newsagent and general store. In the Estate behind there are several other shops. Goods that cannot be obtained at these shops are obtained from the
